title: Adani Enterprises to invest Rs 80,000 crore in capex this fiscal
description: Adani Enterprises plans ₹80,000 crore capex, focusing on ANIL and airports. Ganga Expressway gets ₹12,000 crore. Shah mentions coal-to-PVC and data center. Debt rises 31%. ANIL includes green hydrogen, wind turbines, and large monocrystalline unit.
